run_build.description: Run build (npm run build). Results will be saved to `out/build-out.txt` file, only respond with details of errors; Respond OK otherwise.

run_unit_tests.description: Run unit tests (npm run test). Results will be saved to `out/tests-out.txt` file, only respond with details of failures, Respond OK otherwise.

run_lint.description: Run lint with autofix. Results will be saved to `out/lint-out.txt` file, only respond with details of errors; Respond OK otherwise.

run_single_unit_test.description: Run single unit test. Results will be saved to `out/tests-out.txt` file, only respond with details of failures, Respond OK otherwise.

run_single_integration_test.description: Run single integration test from `integration-tests` dir. Results will be saved to `out/integration-tests-out.txt` file. Only respond with details of failures, Respond OK otherwise.

testFileName.description: Integration test file name to run (This parameter is a pattern, you may use "simple" to run all .simple.spec.ts files).
